notes.content: Site Inspection completed. Heavy moss buildup on north side, moderate algae staining. Customer very satisfied with quote presentation. Premium package. Payment processed via credit card. Mentioned they also needs service.
Customer mentioned that his pet has anxiety issues during grooming. Recommend using a calm slot with less crowd. Make sure to allocate a calm handler for the next session.

Discussed package upgrade options. Customer is considering the premium monthly grooming plan. Follow up next week to check on their decision and offer any needed clarification, unless there is a change in course.
